page.title: 06A Day In The Life Of Linda
page.content: Linda,aged 15,goes to Moorside High School.She starts at 8.40 a.m,after walkimg to school.She has four lessons a day which last two periods each.Her first lesson starts at 9.05 a.m.The following lessons are the ones she has on Thursdays:Periods 1&2 English Periods 3&4 French Periods 5&6 Maths Periods 7&8 Chemistry Linda has her lunch with her friends in the dinner hall.After dinner there is registration which lasts until 1p.m. Linda goes home at three thirty to do her homework.She is expected to work for 2 to 3 hours each evening. She also goes out at nights with her friends and goes to Youth Clubs that the school runs.
